name: phpAV - AktienVerwaltung
short_description:
is a program to handle your shares within a web interface and see how the value grows up (or not). You can administrate several depots and shares. Course updates can be done manual and automatic with information from "Yahoo!". All values, statistics are online calculated or graphically viewed. Some special feetures for german taxpayers are included.

The diffence to the most existing solutions is, that the profit or loss statistics offered within this tool are time dependent on the duration you have the shares in your depot. So you can get real data about the percentage profit per year.

First usable version was v2.2.0 - 20060814, first public version was v2.6.0 - 20070224.

This program uses PHP (>5.x.y) as scripting language, as template engine 'Smarty' (>2.6.x), as database 'MySQL' (>5.x.y), for creating graphs 'LT Diagram Builder'. A good solution to fit all requirements (PHP, MySQL) is XAMPP.
